Here are some interactive plots produced by me using dataset Instacart. 


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
plot1 =
  instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  filter(n > 10000) %>% 
   mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~aisle, y = ~n, type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
```
